findings.description: A CORS misconfiguration on Plex's WordPress API endpoint that reflects arbitrary origins with credentials enabled could allow malicious sites to read sensitive page content on behalf of authenticated users.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain 2. Make XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 3. If user is logged into Plex, response data is accessible to attacker's script due to Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
